title: [b]Output Filetype[/b]
desc:
File extension to use for rendered images.
[b](Default: jpg)[/b]

title: [b]Save Artist Name[/b]
desc:
Include artist in rendered file name, e.g. Assassinate (Kev Walker).jpg
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Overwrite Duplicates[/b]
desc:
Overwrite rendered files with identical file names.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Language[/b]
desc:
A scryfall supported language code to look for alternate language text.
Phyrexian is not supported at this time.
[b](Default: en)[/b]

title: [b]Scryfall Sorting[/b]
desc:
The method used to sort the Scryfall card lookup results.
[b](Default: 'released')[/b]

title: [b]Scryfall Search Ascending[/b]
desc:
When pulling card from Scryfall, search ascending instead of descending.
For example, in order of 'released', ascending would be oldest to newest.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Force English Formatting[/b]
desc:
Enabling this will force Photoshop text layers to use English formatting.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Targeted Text Replacement[/b]
desc:
Try disabling this if experiencing a crash during the collector info step. Only disable if necessary!
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Skip Failed Cards[/b]
desc:
Automatically skip failed cards without asking for confirmation.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Render Snow Cards with Snow Template[/b]
desc:
When enabled, snow cards will be rendered using Snow template type.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Render Miracle Cards with Miracle Template[/b]
desc:
When enabled, miracle cards will be rendered using Miracle template type.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Render Basic Land Cards with Basic Land Template[/b]
desc:
When disabled, Basic Land cards will be rendered using Normal template type.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Enable Generative Fill[/b]
desc:
When enabled, fullart and extended templates will fill empty space using Generative Fill instead of Content Aware Fill. This feature will not work unless running the Photoshop BETA version.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Always use vertical framing on Fullart Templates[/b]
desc:
When enabled, Fullart templates will frame all art using the vertical 'fullart' frame, even when horizontal art is provided. 
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Hotload Plugin Templates[/b]
desc:
Enabling this will cause plugin template code to be re-cached at each call.
Will add minimal execution time but allows creators to live test code changes.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Testing Mode[/b]
desc:
Enabling this will change the GUI into a simple testing interface.
[b]This setting must be changed manually in config.ini![/b]
